message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $14000. It's a great deal for you, and I'm confident it will be worth every penny. What do you think?
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I'm interested, but I'm looking to pay closer to $13000.  What do you think?
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm not quite there yet. I'm willing to come down to $13500.  It's a fair price, considering the value of the product to you. Let's make this happen!
